_description: ‘Conuertimini in toto Corde vestro’ — nine l2-line stanzas (ababababbcbc) including refrain (rhyming c): ‘And turne to god with al thyn herte’

TCD516.First Lines:
The prophete in his prophecyelernith vs by an holy
                    lore…
TCD516.Last Lines:
…So graunte vs grace þat eurey euery manMay turne to the
                    god with al his herte
TCD516.Attributed Title: Conuertimini ad me in toto corde vestro (f. 24)
